comments: This is a license granted by data producers to the repository, not a licence for data users. I found the definition short, but could not improve it by looking at the provided link. Though the FER type fits, I could not assure if this specific usage license is actually FAIR

No. Suggested text: The Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (CC BY-SA 4.0) allows users to freely share and adapt the material for any purpose, by providing appropriate credit, include a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
